attributes.additional_details:
I’d like this to be put in place as camping and the great outdoors help peoples well being and mental health…

If a permit was in place the government would make money… you’d only have serious campers who leave no trace… it will help benefit so many people 

The world should be a free place but it’s not but don’t stop people enjoy the beautiful world
attributes.background:
I would like you to do a wild camping permit just like a fishing permit 
If you’re caught without you have 7-14 days to produce the permit if not you get fined between £50-100

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see new rights to wild camp, but it's not clear whether you want permits to be available to camp anywhere, or only certain places, and if the latter where.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enshrine in law rights to roam and wild camp in national parks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631241

Create legal rights to wild camp on all 'access land' in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631354
